Introduction
TMPS001:Die_Temperature_Sensor

Introduction

Die Temperature Sensor (DTS), of XMC core allows measurement of the die temperature. TMPS001 App provides APIs to enable the Die Temperature Sensor and measure the Die temperature.

Note:

  • The App provides no UI configuration.

Scope

The TMPS001 App provides APIs to configure & service the Die Temperature Sensor.

Abbreviation

  1. API: Application Program Interface
  2. App: DAVE3 Application
  3. GUI: Graphical User Interface
  4. SW: Software
  5. DTS: Die Temperature Sensor

Reference

  • Device Reference Manual.

Limitation
